mapper.select: select id, boardWriter, boardTitle, date_format(createdAt, "%y-%m-%d %H:%i%s") as createdAt, boardHits from board_table
mapper.insert: insert into board_table(boardWriter, boardPass, boardTitle, boardContents, fileAttached) values (#{boardWriter}, #{boardPass}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContents}, #{fileAttached})
insert into board_file_table(originalFileName, storedFileName, boardId) values (#{originalFileName}, #{storedFileName}, #{boardId})
mapper.update: update board_table set boardHits=boardHits+1 where id = #{id}
update board_table set boardWriter=#{boardWriter}, boardTitle=#{boardTitle}, boardContents=#{boardContents} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from board_table where ${searchType} Like CONCAT('%',#{q},'%') order by id desc limit ${page},5
select count(*) as count from board_table where ${searchType} Like CONCAT('%',#{q},'%')
